data.title: Biryusa
data.meta_description: Check out the Reviews of Biryusa with opinions, advice and cruise passenger experiences. Offers, information and departure calendars on Cruising Journal.
data.text:
Description

The Biryusa hovercraft was built in the Leningrad region of Russia at the 'Parma' shipyard. The craft has an inner tube of 0.9 m, enabling it to navigate on land, ice or water, while guests rest comfortably on reclining seats. The propellers enable the boat to turn around and back up, which makes it possible to reach the most beautiful and inaccessible spots along the route and to take guests to any unequipped shore. The double glazing provides additional acoustic and thermal insulation.

On board there is a bathroom and ample luggage storage.

The ship is equipped with modern navigation facilities and sails up to a speed of 50 km / h (31 MpH) on calm water and 60 km / h (37.3 MpH) on ice.

Giorgia Lombardo
